author: j_d
title: Drink up!
review:
Upscaled mug

Pros

Very sturdy, dishwasher and microwave safe, and looks alot like the minifigure accessory.

cons

The color is not very common for the minifig version if it is even made in this color and also you can't (if you want to keep it in its normal condition) let it become colder than 32F or hotter than 203F.
